caption.center: ROBERT GABRIEL, Appellant, v. STATE OF FLORIDA, Appellee.

court.center: District Court of Appeal of Florida, Fifth District.

opinion.posture: Appeal from the Circuit Court for Brevard County, Robert A. Wohn, Jr., Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
James S. Purdy, Public Defender, and Noel A. Pelella, Assistant Public Defender, Daytona Beach, for Appellant.
Pamela Jo Bondi, Attorney General, Tallahassee, and Pamela J. Koller, Assistant Attorney General, Daytona Beach, for Appellee.
opinion.opinion_text:
AFFIRMED.
PALMER, ORFINGER and EVANDER, JJ., concur.
NOT FINAL UNTIL THE TIME EXPIRES TO FILE REHEARING MOTION, AND, IF FILED, DISPOSED OF.
